email.subject: Update: Team Event Now Available
email.body:
Good job #PLAYERNAME#,
It looks like you've got yourself quite the team there! Naix has also finished gathering Team mates now, so it's looking like:
Team Red: Captain: "Naix" - "5plinter" - "Ph4n745m" - "Ch1m3r4"
Team Blue: Captain: "#PLAYERNAME#" - "Grim4ce" - "r00t" - "Cryp70"
First team event has been published, and it's a new one for this year. 'Capture The Flag' You can find out more about how to play in the mission information. It's a test on team's obversation.
When you're ready to start, hit up the new contract on the Battleboard.
- Eleanor Hammond
Hacker Wars Assistant assigned to: #PLAYERNAME#
